name: Pipes of the Warren Guardian
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Ratfolk/New Racial Rules/Ratfolk Magic Items/Pipes of the Warren Guardian

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, summon monster III

sections.body: These finely crafted yellow-ivory pipes are bound in bronze and decorated with bits of amber. If the possessor learns the proper tune, once per day he can use these pipes to summon 1d4+1 dire rats as if using summon monster III. The summoned dire rats also have the swarming racial trait, and count as ratfolk for the purposes of the ratfolk's swarming racial trait.
sections.name: Description
